hero.subtitle: Florals • Event Decor • Custom Tailoring
hero.description: Every detail designed with intention for life's most important moments.

about.name: JLynne Huffer
about.title: Founder & Creative Director
about.bio: A multidisciplinary creative professional with over 15 years of experience spanning fashion design, event decor, and floral artistry. From the runways of New York Fashion Week to luxury events in Denver and now Sarasota, JLynne brings a unique perspective that blends artistic vision with technical expertise. Having worked with celebrity clients at Mood Fabrics and assisted on multiple seasons of Project Runway, she understands how to create experiences that are both visually stunning and deeply personal.
about.quote: Art is a tool for expression, healing, and community creativity.

testimonials.name: Sarah & Michael
testimonials.quote: JLynne transformed our wedding into something out of a dream. Her attention to detail and artistic vision created an atmosphere that our guests are still talking about months later. Worth every penny!

testimonials.name: Lauren C.
testimonials.quote: The floral arrangements for our corporate gala were absolutely stunning. Professional, creative, and delivered exactly what we envisioned. JLC Studio is now our go-to for all company events.

testimonials.name: Emily M.
testimonials.quote: Having all three services under one roof made planning so much easier. The cohesive design across florals, decor, and my custom dress alterations was absolute perfection. I couldn't have asked for more.

testimonials.name: Rachel & David
testimonials.quote: From our first consultation to the final petal placement, JLynne's expertise and warmth made the entire experience a joy. Our photos look like they belong in a magazine!

faq.question: How far in advance should I book?
faq.answer: For weddings and large events, we recommend booking 6-12 months in advance to ensure availability. Smaller events like dinner parties can often be accommodated with 2-4 weeks notice, depending on our schedule.

faq.question: Do you offer consultations?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer complimentary 30-minute discovery calls to discuss your vision and determine if we're the right fit. For in-depth design consultations with mood boards and detailed proposals, we offer paid sessions that are credited toward your final project.

faq.question: What areas do you serve?
faq.answer: We're based in Sarasota and proudly serve the surrounding areas including Bradenton, Venice, Lakewood Ranch, Longboat Key, Siesta Key, and beyond. Travel fees may apply for locations outside our primary service area.

faq.question: Can I combine multiple services?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our unique triple-service model means you can have perfectly coordinated florals, event decor, and custom tailoring from one creative vision. We offer special package pricing for combined services.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: We understand plans change. Cancellations made 30+ days before your event receive a full refund minus the deposit. Cancellations within 30 days are handled on a case-by-case basis. We're always happy to reschedule when possible.

faq.question: Do you provide day-of coordination?
faq.answer: Yes! All of our packages include setup and styling on the day of your event. For weddings and larger events, we offer enhanced day-of coordination services to ensure everything runs smoothly from start to finish.

services.expertiseDesc: The only studio in Sarasota offering florals, event decor, and custom tailoring under one roof.
services.floralLead: From intimate dinner arrangements to grand wedding installations, each bloom tells your unique story.
services.floralDesc: With years of experience leading floral departments for luxury events, we approach each arrangement as a work of art. Our designs blend classic elegance with contemporary flair, using seasonal blooms and unexpected elements to create unforgettable impressions.
services.decorLead: Complete venue transformations that create immersive experiences and unforgettable atmospheres.
services.decorDesc: We don't just decorate spaces—we transform them. From conceptual design through on-site installation, we handle every detail. Our background in fashion and visual design brings a unique perspective to event styling that elevates every celebration.
services.tailoringLead: Bespoke garments and alterations crafted with precision from our NYC fashion heritage.
services.tailoringDesc: With a background that includes New York Fashion Week runway shows and work with legendary designers, we bring couture-level craftsmanship to every piece. From wedding dress alterations to custom garments designed from scratch, each stitch reflects our commitment to perfection.
